Sentencas: Single phase La9.33Si6O26 ultrafine powder, as a kind of highly activated precursor to prepare medium-to-low temperature electrolyte for solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs), has been successfully synthesized via a non-aqueous sol-gel and self-combustion approach from the starting materials: lanthanum nitrate (La(NO3)(3)center dot 6H2O), citric acid, ethylene glycol (EG), tetraethyl orthosilicate (TEOS) and ammonium nitrate.
Titulo: Direct synthesis of La9.33Si6O26 ultrafine powder via sol-gel self-combustion method

Sentencas: The details of gel's self-combustion were investigated by DTA-TG and the structural characterization of as-synthesized powder from self-combustion was performed by XRD and SEM.
Titulo: Direct synthesis of La9.33Si6O26 ultrafine powder via sol-gel self-combustion method

Sentencas: The results show that La9.33Si6O26 single phase of apatite-type crystal structure can be directly synthesized by sol-gel self-combustion method without further calcinations on the condition that the molar ratio (R) of NO3- to citric acid and ethylene glycol being 6:1.
Titulo: Direct synthesis of La9.33Si6O26 ultrafine powder via sol-gel self-combustion method

Sentencas: Such powders composed of well-dispersed particles with an average size of 200 nm and a specific surface area of 5.54 m(2)/g.
Titulo: Direct synthesis of La9.33Si6O26 ultrafine powder via sol-gel self-combustion method

Sentencas: It can be sintered to 90% of its theoretical density at 1500 degrees C for 10h, about 200 degrees C lower than the sintering temperature for the powder derived from traditional solid reactions.
Titulo: Direct synthesis of La9.33Si6O26 ultrafine powder via sol-gel self-combustion method

Sentencas: The sintered material has a thermal expansion coefficient of 9.2 x 10(-6) K-1 between room temperature and 800 degrees C. (c) 2007
Titulo: Direct synthesis of La9.33Si6O26 ultrafine powder via sol-gel self-combustion method
Direct synthesis of La9.33Si6O26 ultrafine powder via sol-gel self-combustion method
